Smokescreen/Beachcomber:



Smokescreen looked to Beachcomber as Ratchet, Sideswipe, Torca, and 
Bluestreak came about.

"You four, Iron Raptor orders half of us to guard the base, the other half 
repair the base as we are being guarded.  So," he said, pointing to Ratchet 
and Blue, "get to the armory.  Beging perimeter sweeps of the area.  Report, 
ANYTHING unusual.  Beachcomber here will help you.  The others, get equipment 
and start repairing the hbase.  I'll stay here and wait for others.  When 
theya re all here, I'll help repair the Ark.  Start with defenses and 
shields.  The Ark's bridge has been totally screwed up."
